Firesoul Combustion.name: Firesoul Combustion
Firesoul Combustion.flavor: Searing gouts of flame roar from your body, rolling over nearby foes.
Firesoul Combustion.attack:
Strength + 4 vs. Reflex, Dexterity + 4 vs. Reflex, or Constitution + 4 vs. Reflex
Increase the bonus on attack rolls to +6 at 21st level.
Firesoul Combustion.onHit: 3d6 + Strength modifier or Constitution modifier fire damage, and the target gains vulnerable 5 fire until the end of your next turn.

Embers of Life.name: Embers of Life
Embers of Life.flavor: Within your wounds, a lively flickering flame glows and surges. Ribbons of fire seal your wounds.
Embers of Life.trigger: You take damage that would reduce you to 0 hit points or fewer

Firesoul Conflagration.flavor: You reach out with your power and set an enemyâ€™s blood aflame inside its body.
Firesoul Conflagration.attack:
Strength + 5 vs. Reflex, Dexterity + 5 vs. Reflex, or Constitution + 5 vs. Reflex
Increase the bonus on attack rolls to +7 at 26th level.
Firesoul Conflagration.onHit: 4d6 + Strength or Constitution modifier fire damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage and the target is dazed (save ends both).
